title: A Cowboy's Last Wish Ride on His Favorite Horse at Bobby's Ranch

tasks.task: MAINTASK: Reward and praise a dog for good behavior.
subtasks: SUBTASK: Speak in a soothing, encouraging tone.
SUBTASK: Use phrases that signify approval ("Good girl!").
SUBTASK: Repeat the commendation to reinforce the positive behavior.
